name: MyAnimeList: Dark and Flat (!important] overrides)
description: This is supposedly a fix for style 101557 for users who are experiencing problems with the style on Chrome. It basically appends !important tags to all tags, credits to Rsslone. Try it out if it works for you, and please provide feedback below if it works or not.

user.name: JeMhUnTeR
user.about: CC0 licenses on all my styles. Feel free to use all my work. No credit required, but would highly be appreciated if you do.

additional_info: Credits to Rsslone for discovering the fix and appending the !important properties to tags.
